named-query.name: findRequirementByFsns
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM Requirement r WHERE r.fsn in :fsns AND r.state = :state AND r.enabled = 1

named-query.name: findRequirementByFsns.count
named-query.query: SELECT count(r) FROM Requirement r WHERE r.fsn in :fsns AND r.state = :state AND r.enabled = 1

named-query.name: findRequirementByIds
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM Requirement r WHERE r.id in :ids

named-query.name: findRequirementByIds.count
named-query.query: SELECT count(r) FROM Requirement r WHERE r.id in :ids

named-query.name: findEnabledRequirementsByState
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM Requirement r WHERE r.enabled = 1 and r.state = :state

named-query.name: fetchBandDataForFSNs
named-query.query: SELECT fb FROM FsnBand fb WHERE fb.fsn IN :fsns

named-query.name: fetchWeeklySalesForFsns
named-query.query: SELECT ws FROM WeeklySale ws WHERE ws.fsn IN :fsns
